system.description:
You have been trained in both physical combat and divine magic and have begun to integrate them. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You can use @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.t3idzgaxlrxbo0o2]{Flurry of Blows} after you cast a cleric spell with a casting time of one action.
  • The @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.nlto7z4j14ips45w]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.kpkmmqvtqai2o44h]{Expeditious Retreat}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.r3olvzsqtktkjwv2]{Invigorated Strikes} spells are added to the cleric list for you.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in adept, 3 levels in cleric
